pages.text: $(li)Piglin are neutral creatures that can be found over the Nether.$(br)$(li)These creatures will become hostile to you if they see you while you are not wearing at least one piece of $(l:patchouli:armors/golden_armor)Golden Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can trade with a Piglin throwing $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingots$(/l) near to it.
They will held a $(l:patchouli:weapons/gold_sword)Golden Sword$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbow$(/l). They may drop their held weapon upon death.
